Procedure.description:
Procedure Purpose: FCI Deactivation
Procedure Version: 2 Responsibility: Eleonora Bassi / Julien Rogissart Last Modified Date: 24.03.2023
Version 2 (TAS - 24.03.2023) Change History: Update from TAS attached to EUM/MTG/AR/6833: @P.6: Added block TCS setdown to NOP ranges.
Version 1: (EB - 06.10.2022) Change History: - Copied from FOM procedure N_FCI_I205 version 1 (delivered in FOM6) Verified with SRDB version MTG_I_PFM_14_01 - Procedure Description field updated according to EUMETSAT template; - Procedure History field erased and restarted from Version 1; - Procedure updated: AIM#225572 and #225513 Added P6 call to N_TCS_I032
Procedure Objectives:
-This procedure send commands to deactivate FCI
Procedure Overview:
This procedure send commands to deactivate FCI - This is a satellite level procedure calling the FCI level procedures to bring the FCI from OBSERVATION / WAIT / CONFIGURATION / HEATER WARMP-UP or SATDNBY mode to SURVIVAL mode. From any other FCI mode, the user shall first complete the on-going operations and bring the FCI back to one of the above modes.
Procedure Pre-conditions: None
Procedure Constraints: None
Spacecraft Configuration: FCI in OBSERVATION / WAIT / CONFIGURATION / HEATER WARMP-UP or STANDBY mode
Ground Segment Configuration: None
Remarks: None
Procedure.title: FCI de-activation
Procedure.author: rogissart_OPRE
Procedure.hierarchy: Child Procedures: Default:NomSysSAT::N_FCI_I730 called by steps: P.1.B1 Default:NomFCI::N_FCI_I580 called by steps: P.2.B1 Default:NomFCI::N_FCI_I046 called by steps: P.3.B1 Default:NomFCI::N_FCI_I044 called by steps: P.4.B1 Default:NomFCI::N_FCI_I042 called by steps: P.5.B1 Default:NomTCS::N_TCS_I025 called by steps: P.6.A2, P.6.A5, P.6.A8, P.6.A9, P.6.A10 Default:NomTCS::N_TCS_I015 called by steps: P.6.A3, P.6.A6, P.6.A11 MTI1:NomTCS::N_TCS_I032 called by steps: P.7

ProcedureArgument.name: END_MODE
ProcedureArgument.description: FCI mode at end of de-activation

step.title: N_FCI_I730 - Stop FWP and PF REPSEQ
N_FCI_I046 - FCI to HEATER WARM-UP mode
N_FCI_I042 - FCI to SURVIVAL MECHANISMS UNLOCKED mode

StepBody.title: FCI STANDBY to SURVIVAL MECHANISMS UNLOCKED

step.title: Set FCI thermal control and monitoring to Non-Op temperatures

step.description: 1st: elarge monitoring to NOP + 2: setdown regulation to NOP range
step.title: Setdown TCS / SCAE
Set SCAE in TCS NOP Monitoring

StepBody.title: Enable/Disable MON POINT - MTG-I PL only

step.title: N_TCS_I015 - Set SCAE in TCS OP config

StepBody.title: Enable/Disable TCS LOOP - MTG-I PL only

step.description: 1st: elarge monitoring to NOP + 2: setdown regulation to NOP range
step.title: Setdown TCS / CCE

StepBody.title: Enable/Disable MON POINT - MTG-I PL only
Enable/Disable TCS LOOP - MTG-I PL only

step.description: 1st: elarge monitoring to NOP + 2: setdown regulation to NOP range
step.title: Setdown TCS / ICU

StepBody.title: Enable/Disable MON POINT - MTG-I PL only
Enable/Disable MON POINT - MTG-I PL only
Enable/Disable MON POINT - MTG-I PL only

step.title: Set ICU OTL to Non-OP in TCS OP config

StepBody.title: Enable/Disable TCS LOOP - MTG-I PL only

step.title: Check + reset PF heater Power limits

StepBody.title: Reset Heater Power Limit (after switch OFF)

step.title: Check SHUTTER position reading from PF
